title: Stone soup
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Marcia Brown
brief_description: Tells the story of three hungry soldiers who are unable to persuade the town people to share food with them. They trick the people by brewing a large kettle to which the villagers contribute their beef and vegetables and all sit down to a banquet. Based on an old French folk tale written and illustrated by Marcia Brown.
